Verses: 1 ardhasashtaa Raajaa Arasaalum Kaalaththil Baabilonilirundhu Ennodekooda Vandha Thangal Pidhaakkal Vamsangalin Thalaivarum Avargal Vamsa Attavanaigalumaavana:
2 pinegaasin Puththiraril Kersom, Iththaamaarin Puththiraril Thaaniyel, Dhaaveedhin Puththiraril Aththoos,
3 paaroshin Puththiraril Oruvanaana Sekkaniyaavin Puththiraril Sagariyaavum, Avanodekooda Vamsa Attavanaiyil Ezhudhiyirukkira Nootraimbadhu Aanmakkalum,
4 paagaadhmovaabin Puththiraril Seragiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Eliyonaayum, Avanodekooda Irunooru Aanmakkalum,
5 sekkaniyaavin Puththiraril Yagasiyelin Kumaaranum, Avanodekooda Munnooru Aanmakkalum,
6 aadhinin Puththiraril Yonaththaanin Kumaaranaagiya Ebedhum, Avanodekooda Aimbadhu Aanmakkalum,
7 elaamin Puththiraril Adhaliyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Eshaayaavum, Avanodekooda Ezhubadhu Aanmakkalum,
8 seppadhiyaavin Puththiraril Migavelin Kumaaranaagiya Seppadhiyaavum, Avanodekooda Enbadhu Aanmakkalum,
9 yovaabin Puththiraril Yegiyelin Kumaaranaagiya Opadhiyaavum, Avanodekooda Irunootrup Padhinettu Aanmakkalum,
10 selomiththin Puththiraril Yosibiyaavin Kumaaranum, Avanodekooda Nootrarubadhu Aanmakkalum,
11 peyaayin Puththiraril Peyaayin Kumaaranaagiya Sagariyaavum, Avanodekooda Irubaththettu Aanmakkalum,
12 askaadhin Puththiraril Kaaththaanin Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaanum, Avanodekooda Nootruppaththu Aanmakkalum,
13 adhonigaamin Kadaisippuththiraraana Elibeledh, Eyel, Semaayaa Ennum Naamangalullavargalum, Avargalodekooda Arubadhu Aanmakkalum,
14 pikvaayin Puththiraril Ooththaayum, Sapoodhum, Avargalodekooda Ezhubadhu Aanmakkalume.

15 ivargalai Naan Agaavaavukku Odugira Nadhiyandaiyile Koottikkonduponen; Ange Moondrunaal Thangiyirundhom; Naan Janangalaiyum Aasaariyaraiyum Paarvaiyidumpodhu, Leviyin Puththiraril Oruvaraiyum Ange Kaanavillai,

16 aagaiyaal Naan Eliyesar, Ariyel, Semaayaa, Elnaaththaan, Yaarip, Elnaaththaan, Naaththaan, Sagariyaa, Misullaam Ennum Thalaivaraiyum, Yoyaarip, Elnaaththaan Ennum Buththimaangalaiyum Azhaippiththu,

17 kasippiyaa Ennum Sthalaththilirukkira Thalaivanaagiya Iththovidaththirku Seydhi Kondupoga Avargalukkuk Karpiththu, Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththup Panividaikkaararai Engalidaththirku Azhaiththuvarumpadi Avargal Kasippiyaa Ennum Sthalaththilirukkira Thangal Sagodharanaagiya Iththovukkum, Nidhaneemiyarukkum Sollavendiya Vaarththaigalai Sollikkoduththen.

18 avargal Engalmelirundha Engal Dhevanudaiya Dhayaiyulla Karaththinpadiye Isravelukkup Pirandha Leviyin Kumaaranaagiya Mageliyinpuththiraril Buththiyulla Manushanaagiya Serabiyaavum Avan Kumaararum Sagodhararumaana Padhinettupperaiyum,
19 meraariyarin Puththiraril Ashabiyaavum Avanode Eshaayaavum Avan Sagodhararum Avargal Kumaararumaana Irubadhuperaiyum,

20 dhaaveedhum Prabukkalum Leviyarukkup Panividaikkaararaaga Vaiththa Nidhaneemiyaril Irunootru Irubadhuperaiyum, Engalidaththil Azhaiththukkonduvandhaargal; Avargal Ellaarudaiya Pergalum Kurikkappattana.

21 appozhudhu Naangal Engal Dhevanukku Munbaaga Engalaith Thaazhththugiradharkum, Engalukkaagavum Engal Pillaigalukkaagavum Engal Sagala Porulgalukkaagavum Sevvaiyaana Vazhiyaith Thedugiradharkum, Naan Ange Andha Agaavaa Nadhiyandaiyile Ubavaasaththaik Koorinen.

22 vazhiyile Saththuruvai Vilakki, Engalukkuth Thunaiseyyumpadikku, Naan Raajaavinidaththil Sevagaraiyum Kudhiraiveeraraiyum Ketka Vetkappattirundhen; Engal Dhevanudaiyakaram Thammaith Thedugiravargal Ellaarmelum Avargalukku Nanmaiyaaga Irukkiradhendrum, Avarudaiya Vallamaiyum Avarudaiya Kobamum Avaraivittu Vilagugiravargal Ellaarmelum Irukkiradhendrum, Naangal Raajaavukku Solliyirundhom.
23 appadiye Naangal Ubavaasampanni, Engal Dhevanidaththile Adhaith Thedinom; Engal Vinnappaththaik Kettarulinaar.
24 pinbu Naan Aasaariyarin Thalaivarile Panniranduperaagiya Serebiyaavaiyum, Ashabiyaavaiyum, Avargal Sagodhararile Paththupperaiyum Piriththeduththu,

25 raajaavum, Avarudaiya Aalosanaikkaararum, Avarudaiya Prabukkalum, Angeyirundha Sagala Isravelarum, Engal Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukkendru Eduththukkoduththa Kaanikkaiyaagiya Velliyaiyum, Ponnaiyum, Panimuttugalaiyum Avargalidaththil Niruththuk Koduththen.
26 avargal Kaiyile Naan Arunootru Aimbadhu Thaalandhu Velliyaiyum, Nooruthaalandhu Niraiyaana Vellip Panimuttugalaiyum, Nooruthaalandhu Ponnaiyum,
27 aayiram Thangakkaasu Perumaana Irubadhu Porkinnangalaiyum, Ponnaippola Ennappatta Palabalappaana Irandu Nalla Vengalappaaththirangalaiyum Niruththukkoduththu,

28 avargalai Nokki: Neengal Karththarukkup Parisuththamaanavargal; Indhappanimuttugalum, Ungal Pidhaakkaludaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Manaurchaagamaai Seluththappatta Indha Velliyum, Indhap Ponnum Parisuththamaanavaigal.
29 neengal Adhai Erusalemilirukkira Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Araigalil Aas
